named-query.name: BpJpaIndexItem_find
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM BpJpaIndexItem i where i.indexName = :indexName AND i.keyName = :keyName AND i.indexValue = :value

named-query.name: BpJpaIndexItem_count
named-query.query: SELECT count(i) FROM BpJpaIndexItem i where i.indexName = :indexName AND i.keyName = :keyName AND i.indexValue = :value

named-query.name: BpJpaIndexItem_findByRemove
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM BpJpaIndexItem i where i.indexName = :indexName AND i.keyName = :keyName AND i.indexValue = :value AND i.elementId = :elementId
